The soul of Napa Valley fine wine.
Rated #1 Vineyard in North America and #5 in the world.

settings.title: DISCOVER OUR WINES
settings.text: The rugged mountain conditions on Mount Veeder produce grapes with intensely concentrated fruit and big, rich tannins.

settings.title: OUR VINEYARDS
settings.text: At elevations of 1,000 to 1,600 feet,  Mount Veeder's vines are planted on wide terraces of earth cut into steep slopes.

settings.title: PORTFOLIO
settings.text: Order world-class wines from home

settings.title: VISIT US
settings.text: Experience Robert Mondavi Winery together in Napa Valley California, through a shared admiration for fine wine, culinary cuisine, and the arts.

settings.section_title: EXPLORE THE BEAUTY OF TO KALON VINEYARD
settings.text:
Share a curated tasting that celebrates the land and its harvest. Book your experience today.

Reservations Required.
Accepting reservations for parties of 6 or less.

settings.title: INCREDIBLE
settings.text:
“Incredible bottling from winemaker Genevieve Jannsens. Will blow away your Opus One any day of the week."

- Curt M, Vivino Reviewer
Robert Mondavi To Kalon

settings.title: EXTRAORDINARY
settings.text:
"Extraordinary, exceptional wine. So much depth and character. Really love this wine."

- John H., Vivino Reviewer
Harvest of Joy Red Wine

settings.title: BALANCED
settings.text:
"So well balanced and complex, this is a top, top wine for me."

– Jason K., Vivino Reviewer
Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon

“Walking through To Kalon, admiring its contours and vines, smelling the richness of its soil, I knew this was a very special place. It exuded an indefinable quality I could not describe, a feeling that was almost mystical.”

– Robert Mondavi

settings.text_1: Over fifty years leading California’s wine industry, and much of the world in winemaking and grape growing innovation.
settings.text_2: Robert Mondavi Winery is home to the highly renowned To Kalon Vineyard, rated #1 in North America and #5 in the world.
settings.text_3: Critically acclaimed, top-rated wines that win the hearts of industry experts, master sommeliers and consumers alike.

settings.title: WINERY
settings.text: Robert Mondavi established his namesake winery in 1966 with a vision to create Napa Valley wines that would stand in the company of the world’s finest. He chose To Kalon Vineyard in the heart of the Napa Valley as the home for Robert Mondavi Winery. This first-growth vineyard, located in Oakville, California, is renowned for producing some of the finest Cabernet Sauvignon wines in the world, as well as for its Sauvignon Blanc grapes, from which Mr. Mondavi crafted his signature wine, Fume Blanc.

settings.title: CHIEF WINEMAKER
settings.text: Geneviève Janssens, Chief Winemaker for Robert Mondavi has received one of the industry’s highest honors, being named Wine Enthusiast’s Winemaker of the Year. These awards recognize excellence in the wine industry, honoring the most notable figures, with a special emphasis on achievements made over the past year. Her wines that are recognized globally for their exceptional quality.

settings.title: COMMITMENT
settings.text: Robert Mondavi is a Napa Green Certified winery. In partnership with the Napa County Resource Conservation District, we created the Napa Sustainable Winegrowing Group (NSWG) which holds several annual workshops on topics such as water conservation, quality improvement, cover cropping, erosion control and pest management. Robert Mondavi was the first winery to receive an Innovator Award from California's Environmental Protection Agency.

settings.title: VINEYARDS
settings.text_1: To Kalon Vineyard is recognized as one of the finest first-growth vineyards of the world. Ancient Greek for “the highest beauty,” it provides us with grapes for our world-class Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve, Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon, and is the exclusive source of our Fumé Blanc Reserve.
settings.text_2: Wappo Hill Vineyard is located on 400 acres below the steep jagged cliffs of the Stags Leap palisades. This region's gravely, clay loam soil, cliffs that reflect the afternoon sun, and nearby bay breezes maintaining cool morning and evening temperatures provide wines with balanced acidity, velvety texture and ripe fruit flavors.
settings.text_3: Los Carneros AVA (Spanish for "the sheep") spans the southernmost portion of the Napa and Sonoma Valleys, just north of San Pablo Bay, where exposure to ocean breezes makes this the Napa Valley’s coolest vineyard area. The location is ideally suited for our Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, which thrive in the cool, lengthy growing season with warm summer days tempered by marine winds and fog.

settings.title: PRESS
settings.quote_1:
"Subtle on the nose...almost Bordeaux-like."

– 2017 To Kalon Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
settings.quote_2:
"This multi-talented, aromatic grape is growing in popularity."

– Robert Mondavi Fumé Blanc
settings.quote_3:
"This generously proportioned, well-balanced Napa Cabernet is remains impressive."

– 2018 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon

settings.text: Search our portfolio of fine wines, order online and have them delivered to your home from Napa Valley.

settings.title: TO KALON RESERVE TASTING
settings.text:
Discover the complexity of our To Kalon Vineyard portfolio with a customizable tasting experience. Sip your personalized selections on our To Kalon patio and experience a celebration of the legendary vineyard.

Please note: Guests must be 21 years and older (infants and children are not permitted).

Offered Daily - Reservations Required
Duration: 75 minutes

$125/person

settings.title: THE ESTATES COLLECTION
settings.text:
Enjoy a curated tasting from our Estate portfolio and share in the spirit of Napa Valley as you take in the view from exclusive seating on our patio. Looking to experience your wine as a complement to food? Inspired food pairings from our culinary team are available to elevate your tasting experience.

Please note: Minors are allowed in your party. Minors (ages 2 to 20) must be counted in your reservation of 6 or less.

Offered Daily - Reservations Required
Duration: 1 hour

$65/person

settings.title: WINE CLUB MEMBER TASTING
settings.text:
Reserved exclusively for our wine club members. Enjoy a curated tasting from our Estate portfolio and share in the spirit of Napa Valley as you take in the view from exclusive seating on our patio. Inspired food pairings from our culinary team are available to elevate your tasting experience.

Reservations Required
Duration: 1 hour

In order to access this experience, you must log into Tock using the email address connected to your club membership. Or email us with date, time, and number in party (not to exceed 6 guests).

Please note: 2-3 weeks advance notice is recommended for weekends.

Complimentary for wine club member and 3 guests, 4 times per year
Additional guests: $50 per person

settings.title: VINEYARD TO TABLE LUNCH
settings.text:
Let your senses revel in this leisurely lunch service, held on our patio with serene views of the garden and vineyards. Our culinary team will provide thoughtful provisions that are locally sourced and remarkable in their fresh simplicity, to be meticulously paired with wines from our Estate Tier.

Please note: Guests must be 21 years and older (infants and children are not permitted).

Offered Wednesday - Saturday
12:30pm - Reservations Required
Duration: 90 minutes

$150/person

settings.title: LEGACY DINNER
settings.text:
Join us for an incomparable tasting event at Robert Mondavi Winery. We’ll unlock our treasured library and invite you to explore older vintages and rare selections from our five decades of winemaking excellence. Celebrate the harmony of wine and food with this private, multi-course meal that must be experienced to be believed.

Please note: Guests must be 21 years and older (infants and children are not permitted). A minimum of 5 guests is required to book the Legacy Dinner.

By Appointment Only
Duration: 3 hours

$425/person

settings.section_title: Join the History of Robert Mondavi Winery Today
settings.text: Become a part of Napa Valley's history when you join our Wine Clubs. You'll enjoy carefully selected wines, discounts on purchases of wine, and complimentary tastings.

settings.text_1: Sign up and become a member today.
settings.text_2: Choose your favorite wines and enjoy up to 30% off.
settings.text_3: Enjoy your wines each month and visit us for exclusive experiences.
settings.text_4: Relax, sip, repeat, and consider upgrading to the next tier of membership.

settings.level_description:

Cost based upon selected wines plus taxes and shipping fees. By law, all shipments must be signed for by an adult age 21 or older.

Will call not available for Trio 3 Bottle Club.

Hand select a case (12 bottles) of wine per quarter (February, May, September, and November) and receive a 25% wine discount.

Cost based upon selected wines plus taxes and shipping fees. By law, all shipments must be signed for by an adult age 21 or older.

Will call not available for Case Club.
This club features 3 bottles of red wine, typically older vintages, or smaller batched production wines per quarter (February, May, September, and November) and receive a 20% wine discount.

settings.header: Order Tracking, Billing & Shipping Info, and Other Details

settings.title: Are there any states you cannot ship to?
settings.content:
Unfortunately, we are not able to ship to the following states:

• Alabama
• Arkansas
• Connecticut
• Delaware
• Indiana
• Kentucky
• Louisiana
• Maine
• Mississippi
• New Jersey
• Ohio
• Oklahoma
• Rhode Island
• South Dakota
• Utah
• West Virginia

settings.title: What does shipping cost?
settings.content:
We offer $25 flat rate ground shipping on all orders up to 12 bottles, and complimentary ground shipping on orders of 12 bottles or more.

We also offer other shipping methods such as 2-day Air. For these methods, shipping charges are calculated when you check out. Shipping total includes product-handling costs. Shipping carrier is determined by the warehouse based upon shipping destination (unless you are a wine club member and have made other arrangements for your club shipments).

settings.title: When will I be charged?
settings.content: Your credit card will be charged when the order has left our warehouse.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my package?
settings.content:
Standard delivery will arrive within 7 to 10 days, following compliance and credit card authorization. Delivery occurs Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. Orders placed by 5:00 PM Pacific Time will ship the next business day, pending compliance and credit card verification. Express shipping is not available for Saturday or Sunday deliveries. Robert Mondavi Winery does not ship on major holidays or weekends.

In cases of extreme weather conditions (i.e., heat and/or cold), Robert Mondavi Winery reserves the right to delay the release of shipments to ensure the highest quality of products at the time of arrival. During the summer, orders are shipped Monday through Thursday, in order to ensure that your wine arrives with limited exposure to heat. All orders placed between Thursday afternoon and Sunday will ship on the following Monday. It is our recommendation, that during summer months, customers add Cool Packs to their order and upgrade to 2-Day Air. If you have questions about which shipping method to use, please contact us at (888) 766-6328 ext 3.

settings.title: Once my order is shipped, how can I track my order?
settings.content: A confirmation email will be sent to you with tracking information. If you have any additional questions or concerns regarding your package, please contact us.

settings.title: Are you able to ship internationally?
settings.content:
Robert Mondavi Winery is licensed to ship wine to the following international locations: China, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, and Taiwan. If you'd like to place an order for shipping internationally, including club memberships, please contact us at (888) 766-6328.

CHINA
Normal Ship Time: 12-16 days

HONG KONG
Normal Ship Time: 7 days

JAPAN
Normal Ship Time: 7 days

SINGAPORE
Normal Ship Time: 7 days

TAIWAN
Normal Ship Time: 7 days

settings.title: Do I need an adult signature for my delivery of wines?
settings.content: Federal law requires a signature be obtained from an individual over the age of 21 for all wine shipments. Notes with a signature, left for the delivery companies, cannot be accepted as a replacement for an individual signing for the shipment. We recommend that orders be shipped to a business address for prompt delivery. We cannot guarantee the condition of any wine if delivery is not made on the first delivery attempt. Orders that are not delivered on the initial attempt may be held in a facility that is not temperature controlled.

settings.title: Can I ship to a PO Box? Any other places I can ship my wine?
settings.content: We cannot ship alcohol to PO Boxes or APO/FPO addresses. State laws prohibit our shipping wine to hotels, motels or licensed beverage facilities outside of California.

settings.title: I missed my FedEx deliveries after they attempted 3 times. Now what?
settings.content:
Don't fret! After the 3-attempts the package will be held in the area for 10-days pending action, before it is returned to our facility. Someone 21+ needs to sign for the package. If you are unavailable, you can log on to the FedEx website or call 1800GoFedEx (say 'hold package') for pickup locations near you. Please note that a valid form of ID is required upon pickup. Once held, most locations require pickup within 5 business days (one calendar week) before it is sent back to us.

If you do need to 'redirect' the package to another location, such as a business address, where someone 21+ will be available to sign for the package, please reach out to customerservice@robertmondaviwinery.com. Packages cannot be redirected between states.

Please let us know if you need help managing your order.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.content: If you cancel your order after it has been sent to our fulfillment center, a 25% restocking fee will be applied before a refund is issued. Please send an email to customerservice@robertmondaviwinery.com if you need to cancel your order. Once the wine has been received at our warehouse, we will refund your credit card account for the cost of the wine less shipping, handling, and the 25% restocking fee.

settings.title: What do I do if the wine I receive is damaged?
settings.content:
Robert Mondavi Winery guarantees quality products and service. Your satisfaction is our first priority. We will replace or refund your cost for any bottle of wine that is damaged or flawed that was purchased through our website. Wines purchased through retailers must be returned to them. We ask that you return the unfinished portion of the original bottle for replacement. By law, we cannot accept returns of alcoholic beverages unless the products are corked or flawed. We are also unable to accept return of wine that was damaged due to adverse weather conditions during shipment, or wine that is ordered in error. Weather damage may include leakage, freezing, and/or corks pushing. Please be sure to check shipping destination weather conditions before placing your order.

To arrange for the return of corked or flawed products, please send an email to customerservice@robertmondaviwinery.com. If the original shipment was damaged or flawed, you will receive a full refund, including shipping and handling charges, or you will receive a full replacement order.

settings.title: How are items substituted?
settings.content: While we continually monitor inventory to ensure our website's accuracy, there are occasions when certain vintages sell out or simply are no longer available. When that occurs, our Wine Specialists will replace the wine with a comparable vintage or varietals. Please call customer service at 800.498.9463, ext. 3 for assistance.

settings.title: Do you have health and safety protocols in place in response to COVID-19?
settings.content:
A visit to Wine Country may feel a little different right now, but our commitment to providing an exceptional visitor experience remains the same. In response to state and county guidelines and recommendations from the CDC, we've implemented a number of protocols designed to keep our guests safe while ensuring an enjoyable and educational visit.

In order to ensure you have the best experience, at this time reservations are required.

• Reservations are required, and can be made on our website's reservation page. Party size is limited to no more than 6 guests. All guests – including children – must have a reservation. When possible, we will accept same-day reservations, but we urge you to plan in advance in order to avoid disappointment.

• If you or anyone in your party exhibits symptoms of Covid-19, please remain at home. We will cheerfully refund your reservation and assist you in rescheduling a future visit.

• Please allow 60 minutes for seated tastings. We appreciate your cooperation with this timing, which allows us to clean and sanitize furniture between guest seatings.

• We welcome trained service animals on the property; however, we regret that we cannot allow family pets.

• Please do not bring in outside food. We have a number of food-pairing options onsite, and there are numerous restaurants within a short drive of the winery.

• Plan in advance. Remember, many restaurants, hotels and wineries are operating with limited capacity to ensure guest safety. Be sure to make reservations well in advance of your visit.

To ensure the safety of our employees and guests:

• Masks are required at all times on our property unless you are seated and enjoying wine tasting or a meal. We'll be happy to provide you with a mask if you need one. Our staff will be wearing masks throughout your visit.

• Please observe social distancing while on the property. We've spaced the tables on our patios and in our tasting rooms to allow for at least 6 feet between parties, and we appreciate your cooperation in complying with this guideline when moving around the property.

• We are conducting regular and rigorous cleaning and sanitizing of our Visitor Center spaces at scheduled intervals throughout the day as well as in between guest seatings.

• Our staff undergoes pre-shift health checks and are washing and sanitizing hands frequently throughout the day, as well as wearing gloves for service. You'll find hand sanitizer stations for guest use throughout the facility.

• We strongly encourage credit cards for purchases on the property whenever possible.

settings.title: THE SPOTLIGHT WINE CLUB
settings.text: EXCLUSIVE ACCESS, PRICING & CONTENT FOR CLUB MEMBERS
Club members enjoy carefully selected wines with three bottle shipments featuring some of the very best wines in our portfolio including limited, pre-released and library vintage wines.

settings.text_1: Complimentary tasting at Robert Mondavi Winery for Club Member and 3 guests.
settings.text_2: Up to 30% off Robert Mondavi wines, merchandise and guest experiences.
settings.text_3: Discount tickets on dinner events at Robert Mondavi Winery and 24hr advance ticket sales.

settings.title: CHOOSE YOUR MEMBERSHIP LEVEL
settings.text_1: Hand select a minimum of 3 bottles of wine on a quarterly basis. Receive a 20% wine discount. Total cost will be based upon your selected wines.
settings.text_2: Hand select a case (12 bottles) of wine on a quarterly basis. Receive a 25% wine discount. Total cost will be based upon your selected wines.
settings.text_3: Three (3) bottles of red wine, or small batch wines, typically older vintages, on a quarterly basis. Receive a 20% discount. $190-$290 per shipment.
settings.text_4: Three (3) bottles of Robert Mondavi red wines on a quarterly basis, including our special winery exclusive wines. $160-$180 per shipment.

settings.title: When can I expect my first shipment?
settings.content: We send wine club shipments in February, May, September and November. You will receive an email notification about 10 days prior to the billing of your shipment. Updates must be made prior to billing. If you join online, we will contact you to schedule the most recent shipment, so you can start enjoying your benefits as a new member!

settings.title: When do my membership benefits begin?
settings.content: Your benefits will be activated after your first shipment is processed. You must take a minimum of three shipments per year to maintain an active status. You will have access to complimentary tastings (4 times per year for Member & 3 guests), exclusive discounts, and advanced ticket sales on events.

settings.title: What is your cancellation policy? Can I skip a shipment?
settings.content: Membership may be cancelled after fulfilling a two-shipment minimum. You may skip up to one club shipment per year. Benefits are not active during skipped shipment periods.

settings.title: Can I update or change my order/shipments?
settings.content: You can make changes or updates to your order prior to billing. Once an order has been processed/shipped, we have the ability to hold, redirect (within state lines), or cancel an order, however shipping and/or restocking fees will apply.

settings.title: Does someone need to sign for my club delivery?
settings.content: Yes, all shipments must be signed for by someone 21 years of age or older. If no one is present at the time of delivery, there will be 2 more attempts made prior to being returned to our warehouse. If the wine is returned to the winery, we can reship the order. Re-shipping fees will be charged. We suggest shipping to a business address, if possible, to avoid any missed shipments or delays.

settings.title: Do you offer a club that ships internationally?
settings.content: We offer both ala carte purchases and club memberships for customers in certain international locations. For more information, please view our international offerings.

settings.custom_html:
Limited-Time
Father’s Day Wine & Gift Sets

Shipping Included on Limited Supply


Since 1966, Robert Mondavi Winery has celebrated the appreciation of fine wine, food and art - and remains the preeminent destination in the Napa Valley. For Father’s Day, bring only the best to Dad with premium Wine & Gift Sets.

settings.title: WINE TASTINGS
settings.text_1:
Discover the complexity of our To Kalon Vineyard portfolio with a customizable tasting experience. Sip your personalized selections on our To Kalon patio and experience a celebration of the legendary vineyard.

Coming Soon: Seasonal food pairings

Offered Daily - Reservations Required

$125/person
settings.text_2:
Enjoy a curated tasting from our Estate portfolio and share in the spirit of Napa Valley as you take in the view from exclusive seating on our patio. Looking to experience your wine as a complement to food? Inspired food pairings from our culinary team are available to elevate your tasting experience.

Offered Daily - Reservations Required

$65/person
settings.text_3: Description of your product or service or short excperpt that introduces your featured content.

settings.text_1:
We invite you to reimagine the spirit of Napa Valley and taste the wines of our popular Napa Valley tier in our elegant Garden Courtyard. Further explore the harmony of wine and food by adding your choice of a la carte offerings.

Offered Fridays & Saturdays - Reservations Required

$50/person
settings.text_2:
Reserved exclusively for our wine club members. Enjoy a curated tasting from our Estate portfolio and share in the spirit of Napa Valley as you take in the view from exclusive seating on our patio. Inspired food pairings from our culinary team are available to elevate your tasting experience.

Reservations Required

In order to access this experience, you must log into Tock using the email address connected to your club membership. Or email us with date, time, and number in party (not to exceed 6 guests).

Please note: 2-3 weeks advance notice is recommended for weekends.
Complimentary for wine club member and 3 guests
Additional guests: $50 per person
settings.text_3: Description of your product or service or short excperpt that introduces your featured content.

settings.text_1:
Let your senses revel in this leisurely lunch service, held on our patio with serene views of the garden and vineyards. Our culinary team will provide thoughtful provisions that are locally sourced and remarkable in their fresh simplicity, to be meticulously paired with wines from our Estate Tier.

Offered Wednesday - Saturday
12:30pm - Reservations Required

$150/person
settings.text_2:
Join us for an incomparable tasting event at Robert Mondavi Winery. We’ll unlock our treasured library and invite you to explore older vintages and rare selections from our five decades of winemaking excellence. Celebrate the harmony of wine and food with this private, multi-course meal that must be experienced to be believed.

By Appointment Only

$425/person
